tool_description: Provides you various kinds  of shirts and pants
name: Shirts and Pants
title: Shirts and Pants

api_list.name: Pants
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shirts-and-pants1.p.rapidapi.com/pants"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shirts-and-pants1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
